titleStmt.title: The fyrst dialogue in Englisshe with newe additions.
Dyaloge in Englysshe.
titleStmt.author: Saint German, Christopher, 1460?-1540.

titleStmt.title: The fyrst dialogue in Englisshe with newe additions.
Dyaloge in Englysshe.
titleStmt.author: Saint German, Christopher, 1460?-1540.
Saint German, Christopher, 1460?-1540. Dialogus de fundamentis legum Anglie et de conscientia. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: In the Fletestrete, by me Robert Redman dwellynge in saint Dunstones parysshe, nexte the churche,
publicationStmt.date: In the yere of our lorde god. M.CCCCC. XXXii. [1532] The fyrst day of the moneth of Iuly]

notesStmt.note: The first dialogue is a modified translation of his: Dialogus de fundamentis legum Anglie et de conscientia.
"The seconde dyalogue in englysshe .. newly corrected and imprinted with newe addycions" has separate divisional title page, register, and foliation.
Both parts contain the revised text.
The last leaf bears printer's mark on verso.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
